thread.title: This company designed workout clothes for guys that are nice enough to wear in public
thread.title_full: This company designed workout clothes for guys that are nice enough to wear in public

author: Tyler Lauletta (feedback@businessinsider.com)
title: This company designed workout clothes for guys that are nice enough to wear in public
text:
You have successfully emailed the post. This company designed workout clothes for guys that are nice enough to wear in public Feb. 17, 2017, 1:42 PM 29,713 
The Insider Picks team writes about stuff we think you'll like. Business Insider has affiliate partnerships so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase. 
Tommy John 
Finding the right workout gear for the fall is tricky since the weather can and often does turn on a dime. What starts off as a run on a balmy afternoon quickly turns into a chilly, wet slog through the streets. 
If you enjoy working out outside, you need clothes that are versatile and ready to take on whatever Mother Nature decides to throw at you. 
A lot of this comes down to having fabrics that are capable of wicking away moisture and keeping you warm, all while remaining breathable. If they can look good while accomplishing all of that, even better. 
Tommy John is a men's clothing company that made its name by focusing on quality fabrics. Initially, founder Tom Patterson set out to design an undershirt that would fit flush with his body and wouldn’t ride up and show through his outfit . He found the right materials, made some shirts, and a few trials later, Tommy John was born. 
Now Tommy John is looking to provide guys with better workout clothes. Tommy John Labs is the company's lineup of breathable, wicking solutions for any guy who hasn’t found the right running gear yet. The fabrics are proprietary and specifically designed to keep you warm while you sweat, and comfortable while you lounge around. 
Below, you can check out some of what Tommy John Labs has to offer. If you’re still looking for clothes for your fall workouts, or for lounging around in post-workout, this is a solid place to start. Performance Tech Quarter Zip Tommy John 
Quarter zips are a great addition to any fall wardrobe; everyone needs a reliable pullover for when the leaves start turning. This one has the added bonus of being great for your workouts, as it's made from anti-microbial and anti-odor materials. Lightweight Performance Pant Tommy John 
Whether you’re hitting the gym or taking your dog out for a walk, the Performance Pant from Tommy John Labs is designed to keep you comfortable. Quick Dry Hoodie Tommy John 
This is probably my favorite piece in the Tommy John Labs lineup based on looks alone. With the silhouette of a boxer’s hoodie, this piece is simple and smooth. It can be worn for casual layering or for the next time you’re capping off a long run by sprinting up the steps of the Philadelphia Art Museum. Quick Dry Henley Tommy John 
If you already have a henley or two in your closet, you know what a versatile piece it is for fall. Worn on its own or under a down vest, a henley provides both style and warmth. This Quick Dry Henley from Tommy John Labs features moisture-wicking and four-way stretch, so it will look good whether you’re marathon-ing through "Stranger Things" or actually running a marathon. French Terry Zip-Up Hoodie Tommy John 
At Insider Picks, we are big fans of zip-up hoodies . A quality zip-up is one of the most versatile items in your closet — you can wear it out for drinks, keep it at the office for when the AC is blasting, or simply lounge in it around the house. This French Terry Zip-Up from Tommy John Labs also features a mock neck, allowing for extra warmth and style. 
Tommy John French Terry Zip-Up Hoodie, $120 Disclosure: This post is brought to you by Business Insider's Insider Picks team.
